wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Granville Sharp (born 7 November 1977, Truro, Cornwall) is an English cricketer currently playing for newly promoted Hayle CC, in the ECB Cornwall Cricket Premier League . Before joining Unicorns during the 2010 Clydesdale Bank 40 competition, Sharp played 9 List A matches for Cornwall, for whom he also plays in the Minor Counties Cricket Championship.

response: Thomas or Tom Sharp may refer to:
* Tom Sharp (trader) (1838–1929), Confederate soldier and explorer, operated a trading post on the Taos Trail
* Tom Sharp (cricketer), English first-class cricketer for Cornwall CCC and Unicorns
